articles.title: European Super League: Real Madrid president Florentino Perez says 'binding contracts' mean founding clubs cannot leave - Sky Sports
articles.description: Florentino Perez says the 12 clubs who were to found the Super League cannot abandon it due to binding contracts, and promised the project would return.
